trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a field.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression> can be used to represent a reference to a field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression> 可用來代表欄位的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>屬性會指定包含欄位的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.FieldName%2A> property specifies the name of the field to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.FieldName%2A>屬性會指定要參考之欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression> to reference a field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>到參考的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the field.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> class using the specified target object and field name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目標物件和欄位名稱來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要參考的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the field name.
Gets or sets the object that contains the field to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含要參考欄位的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the field to reference.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，表示包含要參考欄位的物件。
